√ṛd 'stir, dissolve'

present: [6.] ṛdantu  ā́rdan   -- [1.] árdati etc. AV.+   -- ṛṇatti  

[perfect: ānarda  ārdidat  ārdīt  ardiṣyati  arditā  ]

verbal: arṇṇa?  

secondary: desiderative: ardidiṣa-   -- causative: ardáyati etc. V.+  

derivatives: -ardaka  -ardin C.  ardana E.+  

Of perplexing variety of meanings.
